meta.title: How to Get Here – Bus, Ferry, and Walking Tips
meta.description: Find the nearest bus stop, ferry routes, and walking times to reach Hostel Brikette in Positano.

title: How to Get Here
intro: We’re ~100 m from the Chiesa Nuova bus stop and about a 13-minute walk to the beach.

steps.bus: From Sorrento: SITA bus to Positano (Chiesa Nuova stop).
steps.ferry: From Capri/Amalfi: take the ferry to Positano, then bus or taxi up.
steps.walk: Expect stairs; the view is worth it. Follow signs to Via G. Marconi 358.

photos.heading: See the route before you set off

items.alt: Steps leading to Hostel Brikette with a guest walking toward the entrance
items.caption: From the Chiesa Nuova stop, follow the steps for about a minute—our sign appears on the right.

items.alt: Facade of Hostel Brikette on Via G. Marconi 358
items.caption: Look for Via G. Marconi 358 on the stone wall; the entrance sits just past the street number.

items.alt: Hostel Brikette check-in desk inside the lobby
items.caption: Once inside, the check-in desk is on your left—we'll store luggage if your room isn't ready yet.
